name: ARPG that will be captured
description:
● Game overview
Large breeding monsters and thieves rampaging freely
It ’s a difficult dark continent just to spend today safely.
An action RPG that travels with the Beastman Girl Eld (name changeable)

● System
[Devil difficulty, no game over, action RPG whose ability grows even if you lose]

The balance is very tight at the beginning, but it is a game with very fast growth in ability.
Depending on the difficulty level and the mode selection, it will turn into a fairly easy game.

・ Main scenario cut, you can act freely
・ Top-down action RPG
・ Standing picture changes depending on the situation instead of CG
-Items can be obtained by attacking objects, destroying them, passing them, examining them, etc.
-Equipped with level and EXP for each ability, EXP accumulates due to actions and use of items, etc. and the level rises
・ Random events suddenly attack hordes of enemies on the bed or on the road
・ Can be used for MPC, skill cost, magic gun bullets, and transactions instead of G
・ Changes in the weather in a weekly cycle, morning, day, evening, and night
・ Equipped with a menstrual cycle system
・ If you have too much vaginal cum shot, there is a probability of fertilization, pregnancy, and childbirth.
・ Children who give birth and slaves who are caught or purchased become PT members.
Like the player, you can grow, change graphics, set occupations, etc.
・ There is no game over, and even if you reach 0 HP, you just fall and the battle depends on your fatigue level.
・ If you faint in an unsafe place, you will be taken back to the nest or hideout and detained and become a slave.
There is no event to escape, seeing a gap on your own and escaping from the back of the dungeon
・ Once you pass a checkpoint, you can move to another checkpoint immediately.
・ Equipment with special abilities and various equipment whose performance changes each time you get it
・ Occupation, skill, and menu skill can be selected at the start of the game.
・ There are auto save and quick save functions, and normal save is also possible.
・ Currency and points can be shared between save files using shared data.
・ Difficulty level and mode can be selected

You can browse the contents from the in-game help or the manual folder.
In-game help is installed as a dictionary
It is enough to read the manual for the minimum required knowledge.
There are many customization elements, but you can play as it is without customizing
